main event: A UFO sighting was reported over the ocean between New Zealand and Australia on December 26, 1964, involving an object that was bright, round, and stationary, confirmed visually and on radar.
interesting points: The object appeared to increase and then diminish in size,The RAAF received claims of a mysterious vapor trail that a USAF C-124 encountered,The pilot of the C-124 called in to identify the object causing the vapor trail,Captain D. Shannon confirmed seeing the same vapor trail formation moving from west to east,Official conclusions suggested the sightings could be explained by unusual atmospheric conditions.
sighted object: a bright, round object and a mysterious vapor trail
witness description: crew member of the USAF C-124 and Captain D. Shannon from the Westralia
